official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to authorize the Federal Trade Commission to prevent false advertising with respect to airline passenger services.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Trade Commission Act to make it unlawful for any person to disseminate, or cause to be disseminated, any false advertisement relating to the availability, cost, or conditions of airline passenger services. Sets forth penalties.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to authorize the Federal Trade Commission to prevent false advertising with respect to airline passenger services.
